source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals
source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.

items.title: Digital Marketing Strategies for Entrepreneurs
items.headline: Design Your Perfect Plan to Grow Your Business Without Spending a Penny on Paid Ads
objectives_summary: Increase brand awareness
Attract customers and bring in sales
Low budget, high impact marketing techniques

items.title: Copywriting Mastery: How to Sell Anything
items.headline: Crash Course
objectives_summary: Truth About Marketing.
Psychology of Selling.
Weak Points & Negotiation.

items.title: Effective Email Marketing Tips and Guides For Beginners
items.headline: Watch These Videos and Learn How Building An Email List Properly Can Net You Easy Triple Digit Paydays!
objectives_summary: Inside this course are some ideas and guides that you can apply to your current email list of subscribers and make them buy the products you recommend to them.
Learn more the other essential information that you need about building your list inside this course.
The video series will show you exactly what you can and cannot do in the world of email marketing.

items.title: How to Write a One Page Marketing Plan
items.headline: Write a Marketing Plan in a Day, Marketing Strategy & Action Plan, Online Resources, Templates, Samples, Guides
objectives_summary: Understand what is a Marketing Plan,
Know what is the purpose of a Marketing Plan,
Learn why you need to write one for your business or organisation

items.title: Mailchimp & Mailerlite for authors

visible_instructors.name: Barb
visible_instructors.job_title: Technical Trainer, Book Blogger and Published Author
visible_instructors.title: Barb Drozdowich

items.headline: Helping authors conquer the technology of the popular Newsletter Programs
objectives_summary: Students will be able to produce an attractive newsletter on either MailChimp or Mailerlite with confidence when finished the course.
Students will be able to create opt in and signup forms on MailChimp
Students will be able to create opt in and signup forms on Mailerlite

items.title: Interview Marketing: Create Profitable Content By Interviews
items.headline: Learn how to create profitable content with interviews.
objectives_summary: You'll learn about the three stages of creating content for interviews.
You'll learn how to create content as well as how to build an audience and turn them into buyers.
You'll learn about how to choose the niche that's right for you.

items.title: Presentation Writing Masterclass
items.headline: A step by step guide to writing compelling, persuasive and professional presentations every time.
objectives_summary: This class gives a step by step guide for how to write compelling, persuasive and professional presentations, every time.
Detailed videos with step by step instructions give concrete and practical guidance on how to write a great presentation
Tools include 20 narrative techniques, a checklist for each presentation, 14 in-depth videos and a complete presentation download.

items.title: Relationship Marketing For Customer Retention
items.headline: Effectively using relationship marketing to retain customers
objectives_summary: How to build loyalty
Learn two way communication of relationship marketing
Understand the benefits of relationship marketing

items.title: Market Research | B2B and SaaS Marketing 101

visible_instructors.name: Yogesh
visible_instructors.job_title: Author - Selling Through Content | Digital Marketer
visible_instructors.title: Yogesh Jain

items.headline: The 4 layer model to understand your market and create a stellar marketing strategy for B2B and SaaS businesses
objectives_summary: Use buyer persona to identify the right customer
Understand company's standing in the market using SWOT analysis
Uncover competitive insights

items.title: Drip Campaign & CRM Follow-Up Mastery for Real Estate Agents

visible_instructors.name: Patti
visible_instructors.job_title: Top Producer Training to Close More Leads Fast & Efficiently
visible_instructors.title: Patti Sampson - Realtor®

items.headline: NEW!  A Top Producer Shows You How to Engage & Convert More Leads Faster and You Get the Drip Campaign too!
objectives_summary: Real Estate Drip Campaign and CRM Follow-Up Strategies to Convert More through Automation and Higher Engagement
How to Edit and Implement the Engaging Drip Campaign we Give You to Build in Any CRM!
How to Choose a CRM and Set it Up for your Real Estate Business

items.title: Financial Analysis of Energy Audit and Solar projects
items.headline: Essential for entrepreneurs
objectives_summary: Energy Managers , Energy Auditors, Engineers, Professionals

items.title: Mastering Customer & Partner Interviews

visible_instructors.title: Karyn Holl
visible_instructors.name: Karyn
visible_instructors.job_title: Voice of the Customer and Partner Consultant

items.headline: Learn how to improve your skills for interviewing customers and partners
objectives_summary: How to build a strategy for interviewing target customers & partners
Best practices for preparing for and conducting effective, professional interviews with ease
Tips for documenting, sharing, and acting upon the information you collect in these interviews

items.title: The Top 5 Marketing Mistakes Businesses Make
items.headline: Almost All Business Are Making These 5 Marketing Mistakes.This Course Will Teach You How To Overcome Them.
objectives_summary: This course will help you to identify the five most common mistakes businesses make in their marketing, as well as apply techniques to overcome them.

items.title: Fundamentals of Direct Marketing
items.headline: Practices that profit
objectives_summary: The basic concepts of direct marketing and how to put these into practice
How to understand the audience in order to develop effective media and creative strategies
The acronyms and analytics that define success or failure

items.title: "SIX-Figure" Copywriting That makes you RICH - #Copywriting
items.headline: The  Science of Copywriting.. Fastest, easiest way to become a highly paid and in-demand High-Income Copywriter.
objectives_summary: MDC - This program is for those who want to develop one of the most highly-coveted skills of the 21st century. - copywriting...
From writing persuasively to understanding the deep motivations of why people buy
Million Dollar Copywriting will give you everything you need to make $5,000 to $20,000 a month as a copywriter..

items.title: Understanding Your Customers: 1. Need Recognition
items.headline: Learn how your customers make the decisions that drive business success (Browser recommendations: Safari or Chrome)
objectives_summary: The vital first stage of customer decision making – ‘Need Recognition’
Models, frameworks, and concepts from seminal academia and industry research
The strategic customer insights that underpin effective digital marketing practice
